Articles.Content: Round patch works better I think. Put lettering inside the logo. If you like this I can change helmet logo and final touches then publish.
We are looking for a new member of the Singularity Dev Team. Great experience with Unity is needed. PM me for applications.

We are looking for a new member of the Singularity Dev Team. Great experience with Unity is needed. PM me for applications.

AH DANG i guess i'm out
Why the Comic Sans?
Holy crap thats some nice looking parts! cant wait to see them in action
That....that spaceplane...it's so pretty...I want to make it. Will you be developing spaceplane parts too?

How2FoldSoup: Yea, I plan on developing spaceplanes. They are a bit more difficult to make a universal system of shapes for. The lifting body is kinda difficult to split down into modular parts that can be shared by multiple constructions.

Greenskull, I like it!

skykooler, Don't fight it, you know you love it.

cziken20, Nah man, I'm A'murikan. I just love vodka and the soviet space program.

And now for the art.

Final component for the first rocket, the second stage motor. Anyone want to offer their skills for importing this mess into unity? :C

I added a pair of Imagur galleries to the first post, they will be updated as I post images in this thread. I figured I've reached a point where it's a pain to search through the entire thread for images.

Hah! Funny that importing thins into unity is the only thing which makes my mind blow, except your amazing modelling skills. And i don't know why, yes this modellooks great, but looking on the empty space between nozzles, i... i... feel lonely...
Nice, Daemoria! That looks gorgeous. Easily the best looking art I've seen going into KSP.
Daemoria, just when I thought I'd lost my jaw for the last time, you give us this picture. Dammit.

Final component for the first rocket, the second stage motor. Anyone want to offer their skills for importing this mess into unity? :C

I can do static parts in unity no problem. An animated part like an engine I haven't ever done but I am willing to try. My only reason for not trying is never making any animations lol.
so awesome stylish and beauty parts and drawings - full points to you!

I can do static parts in unity no problem. An animated part like an engine I haven't ever done but I am willing to try. My only reason for not trying is never making any animations lol.

Alrighty then, I guess your part of the team.
I can do playtesting, but that's about it. I have zero experience with Unity, or anything else for that matter. I like the engine bit though.
great, i still haven't found my lower jaw, and now i lose my upper jaw. Don't make me lose my face anymore than it already is:D Keep up the great work.

Itsdavyjones, Hey, it's alright. You're rocking the Cthulhu mustache, no one will notice missing jaw sections.

I'm currently working on the low poly mesh for this rocket, and blocking in the geometry for the Tug. Thank you all who responded for our request for help. As of now SRI will be contracting work with Lack Luster Labs and Green Skull Inc. I hope this can be the start of a very profitable relationship, with quality rockets delivered to consumers in a timely and safe fashion.
Don't forget Kraken Space Industries LLC.
And its over to Daemoria for final suit work

Nice, Daemoria! That looks gorgeous. Easily the best looking art I've seen going into KSP.

Are you just being humble?

Are you just being humble?

I don't think you can be humble when concerning badassery on this level http://i.imgur.com/iKj2tFm.png

: )
The Singularity Dev team (Daemoria, Space_Kraken, Lack, Green Skull) made excellent progress today. We discussed many of the aspects of the mod as well as laying out lots of ideas.
I totally do want thiss.
